hyperparameters.name: encode_to_decode_ratio
hyperparameters.short_desc: Ratio of history window (encoding) length to prediction window (decoding) length.

hyperparameters.name: n_estimators
hyperparameters.short_desc: The number of trees in the forest.

hyperparameters.name: eta
hyperparameters.short_desc: Step size shrinkage used in update to prevents overfitting - alias learning rate

hyperparameters.name: gamma
hyperparameters.short_desc: Minimum loss reduction required to make a further partition on a leaf node of the tree.

hyperparameters.name: use_exogenous
hyperparameters.short_desc: Whether or not to use exogenous features.
